title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Can we please get black market brawlers or doom bots? I'm getting sick of the same 4 gamemodes.(Not counting Hexakill because I dont play it; if it was on Summoners Rift then maybe)

HexaKill twice  on one schedule? So boring.

 Is there anyway we can get Hexakill on SR instead of TT?
I have to agree. If we're going to do Hexakill again in three weeks, at least change the map for some more variance.

i would rather have urf instead
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
totally i agree
same
agree i totally
truuuuuueeeeee{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
speaking of map variety  we need to get together and vote on whether or not they should make different themes for summoners rift. i think its a cool idea
Or Howling Abyss
Holy, it will be a mess
it was pretty bad on SR. take it from somebody who played it there
I played it there as well and I prefer it on SR.
I don't like hexakill that much but 2 hexakill that close, seriously Riot? Where the heck is URF????
IKR
IKR
do urf more often plz
Urf isn't even that great.
go drink bleach and die {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
URF seriously isn't that great.
urf is better than hexakills tho

URF is seriously great.

See how that works?
The only ones I enjoy is URF, and One for All... The other ones are just lame.

I had a feeling it was Hexakill, uggh. 

Real question, what is the appeal of HExakill? It's literally just a regular game with 1 extra person on both sides. To most people, this is the only time people play twisted treeline so is that part of the appeal, too?)

It just feels like a normal game with nothing cool added to it. But now u can get a hexakill!!

I am not trying to hate, I just really want to understand the appeal of this mode.
Same :[ its my least favourite mode

Wasn't there a game mode where you picked the enemy's team?
With URF, doom bots,the black market brawlers.There should be a little more variety.
Sounds like including just changing the map location, they got 8 or more alternative game modes so having the same one crop up so fast seems weird
Your first question - Yes there was a game mode where you picked the enemy's team. It was called Nemesis Draft.

What happened to urf? it was originally going to be on the weekend of 7/1 -7/3
On surrender @20 it said that a few days ago. Now its different.
Are you doing something to urf rito?
Eww. Hexakill 2 times in the rotation for the 4 weeks span.

I would love it if there was a consistent page I could look at that would tell me what the RGM schedule is.  Googling for it gives me a backlog of pages with the same title and no way to cycle forward to today.
Why not bring back snowdown showdown?

hexakill is my least favorite as well and I truly believe that we should be doing one for all more because it is more fun but nothing is as fun as ultra rapid fire. Urf is just amazing in my opinion but I do understand why we can't play urf very often
I agree with you
A lot of people do.

Actually it's less people than you think. But still a lot of people. Personally the community drives me away from it. I just want to play things like Janna on it. You know, fun interesting picks. But I can't compete with Eve, Urgot, Kass, Azir, Ezreal, Hec, Sona etc. And I only named 7, meaning the I can already name off the top of my head more champs then the bans allow. And these champs ABUSE this extremely hard. Like, season 2 Xin Zhao bad. 
Some champions were balanced off of cool downs. Others weren't so much. Which means some abuse it more than others. And when everyone chooses the most abusive champions all the time... Kinda makes the joy from it run out quick you know?
10 vs 10? what would they call that?
Decakill? I mean. Hex = 6. Deca = 10. So I guess it makes sense.

riot
pls
stop with this
just give us doom bots and frikin urf
When is URF coming back? {{champion:236}}

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} sigh hextech, why cant riot use a survay to see what game mode people like the most and atelast do each game mode each month or the month after that, i miss urf{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{item:3070}}

I like hexakill personally also in one of the ask riots they talked about doombots they are working on it. Although hexakill twice in the same month is not the best idea game modes should be spread out. Also hexakill on sr is just one more champion vs three more on tt. I think that is a little more fun.

Ugh hexakill so boring they should put it on aram I think I speak for most of us when I say we want nemesis draft we butcher bridge and black market brawlers with gp announcer voice it was the some of the best game modes pls change up the schedule the game modes are starting to get boring that they are constantly repeating like this

No Urf? 

Did you get rid of Urf entirely?
why is hexakill returning in 3 weeks?
Dont really like hexakill{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Nobody likes hexakill twisted treeline. Why the hell is it always on the rotating game queue?
Hexakill would be much more fun on Summoners Rift
Not really. The reason it is on TT is cause it is a really small map that only normally has 3 players on each side. On SR, it is just another person in top lane.
Twisted hexakill twice. Hmmm :/
They release twisted treeline a 2nd time, but they don't release it on Summoner's Rift...
